articles.content: Perhaps to a greater extent than at any point since the first world war, we find that our lives do not matter to those who govern us. Boris Johnson scarcely seeks to disguise his insouciance and call… [+5643 chars]

articles.author: Joe Duggan
articles.title: Where’s my nearest vaccination hub? Full list of mass Covid vaccine centres - The Sun
articles.content:
TEN new mass Covid vaccine super-hubs across the country have started giving jabs today.
Thousands more people will be given the doses from Monday at the hubs, which include sports venues, conferenc… [+9967 chars]
